mapper.sql: select mv.id as mv_id, mv.model_id, mv.owner_id, mv.version_name as mv_version_name, mv.version_order as mv_version_order, mv.version_tag as mv_version_tag, mv.version_meta as mv_version_meta, mv.storage_path as mv_storage_path, mv.manifest as mv_manifest, mv.eval_jobs as mv_eval_jobs, mv.created_time as mv_created_time, mv.modified_time as mv_modified_time, m.model_name as model_name, u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.created_time as user_created_time, u.user_enabled from model_version as mv, model_info as m, user_info as u where mv.owner_id = u.id and mv.model_id = m.id
mapper.insert: insert into model_version (model_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path, manifest, eval_jobs) values (#{version.modelId}, #{version.ownerId}, #{version.versionName}, #{version.versionTag}, #{version.versionMeta}, #{version.storagePath}, #{version.manifest}, #{version.evalJobs})
mapper.select:
and model_id = #{modelId}
and version_name like concat(#{namePrefix}, '%')
and FIND_IN_SET(#{tag}, version_tag)
order by mv.version_order desc
mapper.update: update model_version set version_order = if((select version_order from ((select version_order from model_version where id = #{modelVersionId})) as v1) = (select max from (select max(version_order) as max from model_version where model_id = (select model_id from model_version where id = #{modelVersionId})) as v2) and (select version_order from ((select version_order from model_version where id = #{modelVersionId})) as v3) != 0, (select version_order from (select version_order from model_version where id = #{modelVersionId}) as v4), (select max from ((select max(version_order) as max from model_version where model_id = (select model_id from model_version where id = #{modelVersionId}))) as v5) + 1) where id = #{modelVersionId}
